announce.message: The realm shakes as Gnomevil draws near in Crystal World. Mightiest Warriors Prepare Your Weapons!
Evotronus, stand united! Gnomevil, the embodiment of chaos, is about to descend upon Crystal World. Prepare for the ultimate challenge!
Steel your hearts, brave warriors! Gnomevil, the formidable foe, approaches in Crystal World!
Evotronus Warriors, brace yourselves! Gnomevil, the ultimate challenge, is about now to emerge in Crystal World. Unite and conquer!
